extendedInfo.description: This application tracks holiday and year-round gifts. You register people and events then update with what you purchased.  There are reports to track what's left to buy. Great App for Christmas, Boxing Day, Hanukkah..An Ad-Free version is available which also includes password protection.Website for Upgrade Instructions.

reviews.comment: Dates dont save correctly. It is hard to easily see what you need to get for people. Report: need to scroll to see gifts that are coming soonest.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: Very poor. Clunky, confusing interface; doesn\'t sort by event, just person; recurring events seem to appear only in notes list area, & not sorted by date (2012 is before 2011), & can\'t edit to add gifts to that event - not sure of the point; doesn\'t sort by date in list (though shows next event for ea. person, which is good); in report view, it doesn\'t sort by date (or anything in particular); \"recent events\" includes upcoming events. Try Gift List Manager (not great) or just use Amazon wish list gifts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good - would be nice to have non-American date format ie dd/mm/yy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Should be more similar to Xmas version. Just a gift idea list would be great.

reviews.comment: Would be good if they can extract birthdays and anniversaries fm contact list

reviews.comment: It was more convenient to just grab a pen and paper. Too man steps, not easy to quickly glance at.

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t acknowledge the dates I put in. Puts its own. Uninstalling.

reviews.comment: Would be better if you could add gift ideas to a person directly, without having to create an event, then specify an event when you purchase the gift.

reviews.comment: Update is very helpful. Will be using this on black Friday. Thanks! The only other thing that would be nice is a \"total spent on an event\" great app!

reviews.comment: This is definitely a good start. Would love to assign multiple gifts and prices. Wrapping info would be nice too.

reviews.comment: Great in theory, but useless if can only list one gift per person at Christmas. Please update for multiple gifts.

reviews.comment: Love the app. Any possibility of getting password protection on it so kids can\'t read it?
